channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Vimeo Lays Off ‘Most’ of Its Staff, Allegedly Includes ‘the Entire Video Team’
item.description: Employees reported major job cuts this week, just months after the video hosting site was bought by Bending Spoons.

item.title: Elle cartonne sur Spotify… mais c’est une IA
item.description: Ils sont des millions à être tombés sous le charme de la voix soul de Sienna Rose. La chanteuse classe plusieurs de ses titres dans les classements des plateformes de streaming. Seul problème : Sienna Rose n'existe sans doute pas, Deezer l'ayant catalogué comme une IA.

item.title: Huge data leak of 149 million credentials exposed without any protection – 98GB of unique usernames and passwords from financial services, social media accounts and dating apps
item.description: 98GB cloud storage container left exposed online and remained exposed for almost a month after discovery.

item.title: Carrefour : les 12 meilleures offres des soldes qui valent le coup ce week-end
item.description: Ce week-end, Carrefour lance une avalanche de bonnes affaires à l’occasion de la 3ᵉ démarque des soldes d’hiver ! Les offres se multiplient sur une large sélection de produits Tech : TV OLED à prix réduits, smartphones à petits prix et PC portables en promo… de quoi se faire plaisir sans se ruiner.

item.title: Here’s what you should know about the US TikTok deal
item.description: A number of investors are competing for the opportunity to purchase the app, and if a deal were to go through, the platform's U.S. business could have its valuation soar to upward of $60 billion.

item.title: Custom-made 'vishing' kits are attacking SSO accounts across the world - Google, Microsoft and Okta under threat, here's what we know
item.description: The kits are so good that vishing is growing more popular, but there is a solution.

item.title: Age Verification Is Reaching a Global Tipping Point. Is TikTok’s Strategy a Good Compromise?
item.description: TikTok’s new age-detection tech seems like a better solution than automatically banning youth accounts. But experts say it still requires social platforms to surveil users more closely.

item.title: Giving your healthcare info to a chatbot is, unsurprisingly, a terrible idea
item.description: Every week, more than 230 million people ask ChatGPT for health and wellness advice, according to OpenAI. The company says that many see the chatbot as an "ally" to help navigate the maze of insurance, file paperwork, and become better self-advocates. In exchange, it hopes you will trust its chatbot with details about your diagnoses, […]

item.title: AdGuard goes open-source with its custom VPN protocol that can mimic web traffic
item.description: AdGuard VPN's TrustTunnel is already being used across AdGuard VPN apps and is now available to "use, run, tweak, extend, and build upon," said the provider.

item.title: The Math on AI Agents Doesn’t Add Up
item.description: A research paper suggests AI agents are mathematically doomed to fail. The industry doesn’t agree.

item.title: Why this winter storm will likely be a wild one
item.description: Most of the US is bracing for a prolonged stretch of frigid weather and a massive winter storm that could wreak havoc on roads and power grids over the next several days. At least 170 million Americans are under winter weather alerts. "Bitterly cold temperatures and dangerously cold wind chills" will linger even after the […]

item.title: This startup will send 1,000 people’s ashes to space — affordably — in 2027
item.description: Started by an engineer who worked on the space shuttle program, and at Blue Origin, Space Beyond has a spot on a 2027 Falcon 9 flight.

item.title: The PlayStation Portal has been my favorite PS5 accessory since it launched — here are 8 ways Sony could make a new version even better
item.description: I’m a huge fan of the PlayStation Portal, but I think a newer version could make it even better. Here are the upgrades in a new model I’d love to see.

item.title: Thinking about revisiting The Witcher 3 ahead of The Witcher 4? This Witcher Online mode might keep you busy in the meantime
item.description: If you're thinking about diving back into The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt ahead of The Witcher 4, someone has released a multiplayer mod that may tide you over.

item.title: Get the Xreal One Pro AR Glasses for $170 less at Amazon
item.description: As of Jan. 23, the Xreal One Pro AR Glasses are on sale for $599, down from$769, at Amazon. That's a 22% discount or $170 in savings.

item.title: How to watch all of the 2026 Best Picture Oscar nominees
item.description: Here's how to watch every nominee for Best Picture at the 2026 Oscars: "One Battle After Another," "Sinners," "Hamnet," and more.

item.title: 50 ans après Apollo, pourquoi ce retour historique vers la Lune dépend de quelques jours clés
item.description: La fusée d’Artemis II est désormais sur son pas de tir en Floride et le compte à rebours technique a commencé. Mais contrairement aux apparences, la date de lancement ne dépend pas seulement de l’état du SLS : mécanique orbitale, sécurité des astronautes, énergie solaire et même météo imposent à...

item.title: Cette puissante barre de son JBL à moitié prix est l’affaire en or des soldes d’hiver
item.description: Compacte et puissante, la JBL SB560 est une barre de son idéale pour un téléviseur. Compatible Bluetooth, elle se transforme en enceinte traditionnelle pour diffuser de la musique depuis un smartphone. Durant les soldes d'hiver 2026, elle voit son prix chuter de 249 euros à seulement 129 euros grâce à un code promo.

item.title: Microsoft gave FBI a set of BitLocker encryption keys to unlock suspects’ laptops: reports
item.description: The FBI served Microsoft a warrant requesting encryption recovery keys to decrypt the hard drives of people involved in an alleged fraud case in Guam.

item.title: TikTok-like microdramas are going to make billions this year, even though they kind of suck
item.description: The business model behind these apps replicates the same dark patterns as mobile games.

item.title: ‘Jujutsu Kaisen’ Peaked With Maki Zenin’s Rebirth
item.description: Mappa's adaptation of Maki Zenin's big moment deserves to be hung in the rafters of generational anime beatdowns.

item.title: Bezos’s Next Rocket Launch Might Be the Most Crucial Yet for Blue Origin
item.description: The company will reuse a New Glenn rocket booster for the first time.

item.title: TikTok finalizes deal to create new US entity and avoid ban
item.description: The deal ends a six-year long political saga that that started in 2020 when President Donald Trump tried to ban the app over national security concerns during his first term.

item.title: Tesla Optimus : le robot humanoïde chez vous dès 2027 ? Elon Musk y croit
item.description: Invité surprise à Davos, Elon Musk a lâché une information capitale pour l'avenir de Tesla. Le robot Optimus pourrait débarquer dans les foyers d'ici la fin 2027. Un pari risqué, mais vital pour la marque.

item.title: Snag a Magic: The Gathering March of the Machine booster box for below market value
item.description: As of Jan. 23, get the Magic: The Gathering March of the Machine booster box for below market value.

item.title: Get the Anker Solix C1000 Gen 2 portable power station for nearly half price
item.description: The Anker Solix C1000 Gen 2 is on sale at Amazon for only $429. That's 46% or $370 off its list price.

item.title: How to watch Skyscraper Live: See Alex Honnold climb one of the worlds tallest buildings in real time
item.description: Alex Honnold will climb Taipei 101 skyscraper live on Netflix in 'Skyscraper Live.' Here are the streaming details.

item.title: Iran Shows Why America’s Embrace of Stablecoins Is a Double-Edged Sword
item.description: Lawmakers are propping up the sanction-avoidance industry in the name of the almighty dollar.

item.title: OpenAI chief Sam Altman plans India visit as AI leaders converge in New Delhi: sources
item.description: Sam Altman is set for his first India visit in nearly a year.

item.title: Anbernic’s New Controller Has a Screen and Built-In Heartbeat Sensor, for Some Reason
item.description: The retro Game Boy maker's first pro-level controller may still be enticing even to non-hypochondriacs.

item.title: Fortinet FortiGate devices hit in automated attacks which create rogue accounts and steal firewall data
item.description: A recent patch is apparently not working particularly well, and Fortinet is already working on another.

item.title: The end of the Sony era in TVs
item.description: There aren't many tech companies that can claim Sony's level of influence in how we live our lives. From the Walkman to the PlayStation to the Trinitron, Sony has been making excellent gadgets in multiple categories for decades, which makes this week's news just a little sad. Sony's new joint venture with TCL isn't the […]

item.title: Ce bug des smartphones Pixel est un cauchemar pour la vie privée
item.description: Quelques utilisateurs sont touchés par un problème très étrange. De quoi donner des sueurs froides chaque fois que quelqu'un vous appelle et que vous ne décrochez pas.

item.title: Cracking the AI code: realizing AI's true value in finance
item.description: AI's role in finance is evolving, and finance teams must now focus on delivering tangible results.

item.title: Super Marios Wonder is coming to life — heres where to preorder Nintendos Talking Flower
item.description: Nintendo is bringing 'Super Mario Bros. Wonder' to life with the Talking Flower. Preorder now at Nintendo before its March 12 arrival.

item.title: Raspberry Pi dégaine un nouveau produit, et ce n’est pas un PC
item.description: Loin est le temps de la simple petite carte PC à 40 dollars, Raspberry continue d'étendre son écosystème de produits. Cette fois, c'est une clé USB, et ce n'est pas sans intérêt.

item.title: Voici quand vous verrez encore plus de publicités sur l’App Store
item.description: Après avoir annoncé l'arrivée de publicités supplémentaires dans l'App Store, Apple dévoile quand nous y aurons droit.

item.title: Tesla cars in the U.S. no longer come with Autopilot
item.description: Tesla has discontinued its Autopilot set of driving assistance features in the U.S.

item.title: Gaze Deeply Into Nature With These Award-Winning Ecology Photos
item.description: Winning shots from the Capturing Ecology competition highlight the complex relationships that shape ecosystems.

item.title: Epson EcoTank ET-4950 series review: I can’t find another mid-price printer so loaded with features and ink
item.description: Epson’s feature-packed 4-in-1 can even duplex scan.

item.title: Anbernic’s next wireless controller adds a screen and heart rate monitoring
item.description: Anbernic has announced its second wireless controller through a teaser video on YouTube highlighting its features. The company's first gamepad, the RG P01, offered features like Hall effect triggers and joysticks for just $18. Pricing for the new Anbernic RG G01 hasn't been revealed, but it may be more expensive due to several upgrades, including […]...

item.title: Les géants de la tech dépensent sans compter pour se mettre l’administration Trump dans la poche
item.description: Les grandes entreprises de la tech ont dépensé sans compter pour être dans les petits papiers de l'administration Trump. Les dépenses de lobbying ont été dévoilées et elles sont globalement en hausse. Meta, Amazon et Google ont été les plus dépensiers l'an dernier.

item.title: Microsoft 365 outage cause revealed
item.description: Microsoft shed some light on what caused its major 365 outage on Jan. 22.

item.title: 1348: Ex Voto, an action game featuring a female knight on a quest to save Jennifer English in medieval Italy, sounds like just the game for me, and it's launching in March
item.description: Indie studio Sedleo and publisher Dear Villagers have announced that their medieval action-adventure game 1348: Ex Voto will launch on March 12, 2026, for PC and PS5.

item.title: « C’est extrêmement simple de le sortir pour shooter » : nous avons mis le Fujifilm X Half dans les mains de l’un de nos lecteurs [Sponso]
item.description: Tenté par l'effet vintage du Fujifilm X Half ? Ce petit boîtier au rendu argentique est proposé à 799 euros par le constructeur. Mais est-il fait pour vous ? Pour le savoir, nous l'avons confié à l'un de nos lecteurs.

item.title: 'We have initiated an immediate internal review': Asus responds to worries about AMD Ryzen 9800X3D CPUs dying in its motherboards
item.description: Following past issues with ASRock motherboards, we're now seeing an uptick in reports of problems with Asus boards.

item.description: Gearing up to shred the slopes or dive into the seas? These photography tools are made for danger.

item.title: Influencers are pushing suspicious peptides. How much are you willing to risk?

Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. On TikTok, it's disturbingly easy to find videos of […]

item.title: Only 1 week left (or until the first 500 passes are gone): The first TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket discount is ending
item.description: Register now to save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 pass and get a second ticket at 50% off. This offer ends next week on January 30, or once the first 500 tickets are claimed — whichever comes first.

item.title: Die My Love missing a best cinematography nod is the most outrageous 2026 Oscars snub — but Seamus McGarvey's starter camera kit is exactly what any budding filmmaker needs
item.description: I'm furious that Die My Love is missing from this year's Oscars lineup, but for cinematographer Seamus McGarvey, the magic is in 'how we look and feel, not what we use to shoot with'.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max, and more this weekend (January 23)
item.description: From anticipated new shows to the streaming debut of two movie biopics, here's what you'll want to watch this weekend.

item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Trois câbles sous-marins sabotés en Europe : la Finlande soupçonne la Russie
item.description: En quelques jours, trois câbles sous-marins ont été sectionnés en mer Baltique. Deux navires ont été identifiés comme étant potentiellement à l'origine des incidents, dont un cargo chargé d'acier russe. Les autorités redoutent une opération de sabotage en provenance de la Russie.

item.title: The human paradox at the center of modern cyber resilience
item.description: Human workers are key to preventing cyberattacks and operating alongside AI to enhance cyber resilience.

item.description: How to watch college basketball without cable. Watch college basketball live streams and get the best streaming deals.

item.title: On a vu la première voiture électrique chinoise qui conduit seule à 120 km/h : la GAC Hyptec A800
item.description: On a pu monter à bord de la voiture électrique chinoise qui a obtenu la première licence locale pour conduite en autonomie à 120 km/h, la GAC Hyptec A800. Voici notre premier avis.

item.title: 14 of the best deals from the Amazon UK weekend sale – I've picked the top tech offers from £13.99
item.description: I've searched through this weekend's sale at Amazon UK and picked out 14 of the best tech offers that start from just £13.99.

item.title: L’une des meilleures enceintes portables connectées de chez Bose revient à un super prix pour les soldes
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver continuent et pour l'occasion Amazon lâche une belle offre pour une enceinte intelligente. La puissante et mobile Bose Portable Smart Speaker passe de 419 euros lors de son lancement à 239 euros.

item.title: Malaysia lifts ban on Grok after taking X at its word
item.description: After being one of the first countries in the world to block Elon Musk’s Grok chatbot, Malaysia has now lifted its ban. Along with Indonesia, the country moved swiftly to temporarily halt access to X's frequently controversial AI chatbot earlier this month, after multiple reports emerged of it being used to generate deepfake sexualized images of people, including women and children. At the time, the Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission (MCMC) said the restrictions would remain in place until X Corp and parent xAI could prove they had enforced the necessary safeguards against misu...

item.title: « Vers une hausse massive des prix » : pourquoi vous ne trouverez bientôt plus de GPU Nvidia au prix officiel
item.description: La notion de prix conseillé n'a décidément plus aucun sens alors que Nvidia aurait abandonné un programme incitant ses partenaires à le pratiquer.

item.title: AI labs wage a reputational knife fight at Davos
item.description: This is an excerpt of Sources by Alex Heath, a newsletter about AI and the tech industry, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. The leaders of the three preeminent frontier AI labs spent this week at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, taking shots at each other like candidates in a […]

item.title: Samsung a gaffé : l’énorme nouveauté écran du Galaxy S26 Ultra confirmée par erreur
item.description: Samsung a laissé apparaître un indice explicite sur une fonctionnalité très attendue de son prochain smartphone haut de gamme. Une capture publiée sur son propre site montre en effet la présence de l’« Affichage confidentiel » pour One UI 8.5.
